Friends

class Animation

Detailed Description

Control centre for the animation system.

All animations are stored here and retrieved through the get and find methods.

Member Typedef Documentation

typedef std::map< std::string, Animation * > Moo::AnimationManager::AnimationMap

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

Moo::AnimationManager::AnimationManager (  ) 

Member Function Documentation

AnimationPtr Moo::AnimationManager::find ( const std::string &  resourceID  ) 

This private method returns the animation manager's private copy of the the input animation resource.

The AnimationManager keeps a map of animations that it has loaded, and if the input name exists in the vector, it returns that one; otherwise it loads a new one and returns it (after storing it in the vector for next time).

void Moo::AnimationManager::fullHouse ( bool  noMoreEntries = true  ) 

Set whether or not we have a full house (and thus cannot load any new animations).
